string.index: Show and navigate running applications view
Double tap and hold then drag
string.message: İki kere dokunun ve ardından sürükleyin
Sağ tuş seçkesini gööstermek için dokunun

string.index: Rotate two fingers clockwise or counterclockwise
string.message: Rotieren Sie zwei Finger im oder gegen den Uhrzeigersinn

string.index: Smart Detector gives you a smooth typing experience. By enabling it, the tapping function of the touchpad is auto-locked during typing.
string.message: Smart Detektor sorgt für ein reibungsloses Tippen. Wird er aktiviert, ist das Touchpad beim Tippen automatisch gesperrt.

string.index: Drag the circle to move its dots and drag the position to change its size.
string.message: Ziehen Sie den Kreis, um seine Punkte zu verschieben, und ziehen Sie die Position, um seine Größe zu ändern.

string.index: Disable touchpad when mouse is plugged-in
string.message: Fare takıldığında dokunmatik yüzeyi devre dışı bırak
Vom rechten Rand nach links streichen
Vom oberen Rand nach unten streichen
Vom linken Rand nach rechts streichen

string.index: You can choose to disable touchpad once an USB or wireless mouse is connected to the notebook.
string.message: Herhangi bir fare bağlandığı anda dokunmatik yüzeyin etin ya da devre dışı olacağını seçebilirsiniz.

string.index: Content moves with your finger's direction
string.message: İçerik, parmağınızın ilerlediği doğrultuda hareket eder

string.index: Enable Remote Link in my PC
Remote Link provides a friendly way to remotely control your PC through Bluetooth.
string.message: Remote Link, Bluetooth aracılığıyla bilgisayarınızı kolayca uzaktan yönetmenizi sağlar.

string.index: Your Smart Gesture supports Remote Link. Click here for details.
string.message: Smart Gesture, Remote Link'i desteklemekte. Ayrıntılar için bunu seçin.

string.index: There are several ways to install Remote Link.
string.message: Remote Link'in kurulumu yapabileceğiniz birkaç yol bulunmaktadır.

string.index: Use the QR code scanner to quickly and accurately scan the QR code.
string.message: Kare kodu hızlı ve doğru şekilde taramak için kare kod okuyucu kullanın.

string.index: Search "Remote Link" from Google Play or
string.message: Ya da Google Play'de "Remote Link" araması yapın.

string.index: You'll enjoy controlling with gestures to go back/forward in browsers and switching desktops more than what Windows provides like launching Task View, Cortana, and Notifications.
string.message: Sie genießen die Steuerung mit Gesten zur Vorwärts-/Rückwärtsnavigation in Browsern und zum Wechseln zwischen Desktops mehr als mit dem Windows-Leistungsumfang; enthalten sind beispielsweise die Einblendung von Aufgabenansicht, Cortana und Benachrichtigungen.

string.index: You can use the native Windows touchpad configuration without any optimization made by ASUS Smart Gesture.
string.message: Sie können die native Windows-Touchpad-Konfiguration ohne jegliche Optimierung durch ASUS Smart Gesture nutzen.

string.index: Tap or swipe to show pop-up menu
string.message: Zur Anzeige des Pop-up-Menüs tippen oder wischen

string.index: Execute Microsoft Cortana, notifications, task view, or switch pages in browser
string.message: Microsoft Cortana, bildirimler, görev görünümü ya da tarayıcıda sayfa değiştirme

string.index: Content moves in the other direction with swipe
Execute Microsoft Cortana, notifications, task view, or switch desktops
string.message: Microsoft Cortana, bildirimler, görev görünümü ya da masaüstleri arasında geçiş

string.index: Use gestures for quick and easy navigation, such as on Windows® Store apps, web pages, desktops, active apps, and Windows® Charm bar.
string.message: Nutzen Sie Gesten zur schnellen und einfachen Navigation, bspw. in Windows® Store-Apps, Webseiten, Desktops, aktiven Apps und Windows® Charms-Leiste.

string.index: Please try it to experience a smoother performance.
string.message: Bitte testen Sie es für geschmeidigere Leistung.

string.index: Remote Link provides a friendly way to remotely control your PC through Wifi or Bluetooth.
string.message: Remote Link, Bluetooth ya da kablosuz ağ aracılığıyla bilgisayarınızı kolayca uzaktan yönetmenizi sağlar
